name: Love waifu #219 - Flexible Intentions
description: Bent over in her tracksuit, her ass juts out with every squat. The fabric strains, seams threatening to split. Her purple eyes lock onto yours mid-rep, her tongue darting over her lips. ‘Like what you see?’ her smirk says. The only thing getting exercised here is your self-control.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
